content: band round 7 work as for round 1 round 1 k around with cc2 break cc2 round 2 k2 with cc2 k1 with cc1 k5 with cc2 around round 3 k1 with cc2 k3 with cc1 k4 with cc2 around with ac knit two full rounds round 4 k5 with cc1 k3 with cc2 around round 5 work as for round 3 seventh band round 6 work as for round 2 round 1 k around with cc1 round 7 work as for round 1 round 2 k1 with cc1 k1 with mc k5 with cc1 around break cc1 round 3 k3 with mc k4 with cc1 around round 4 k4 with mc k2 with cc1 k1 with mc around with ac knit one full round round 5 work as for round 3 round 6 work as for round 2 round 7 work as for round 1 break mc with ac knit two full rounds eighth band round 1 k around with cc2 round 2 k5 with cc2 k1 with cc1 k1 with cc2 around round 3 k4 with cc2 k3 with cc1 around round 4 k1 with cc1 k2 with cc2 k4 with cc1 around round 5 work as for round 3 round 6 work as for round 2 round 7 work as for round 1 break cc1 with ac knit one full round next round with ac k1 k2tog k5 to last 6 sts k2tog k4 138 sts remain diamond cowl version 1 // ©2024 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission ninth band finishing round 1 k around with mc bind off in pattern round 2 k1 with mc k1 with cc2 k4 with mc around weave in ends round 3 k3 with cc2 k3 with mc around wet block to even colorwork and allow your fiber to bloom round 4 k4 with cc2 k1 with mc k1 with cc2 around note if you are using hand-dyed colors in your cowl we round 5 work as for round 3 recommend using a color catcher and cool water submerge round 6 work as for round 2 your cowl and let the fibers relax but watch it to ensure color is not releasing into the water do not leave piece to soak round 7 work as for round 1 unattended you may also choose to steam block with a break cc2 generous amount of steam with ac knit two full rounds tenth band round 1 k around with cc1 round 2 k4 with cc1 k1 with mc k1 with cc1 around round 3 k3 with cc1 k3 with mc around round 4 k1 with mc k1 with cc1 k4 with mc around round 5 work as for round 3 round 6 work as for round 2 round 7 work as for round 1 *break cc1 ribbing with mc k around once decreasing 2 sts evenly
